question: 硬い
userAnswer: stiff/tight | hard/solid | formal/stuffy | strong/firm | safe/steady | obstinate
activeAnswer: stiff/tight | hard/solid | formal/stuffy | strong/firm | safe/steady | obstinate
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>stiff</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>stiff</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>hard</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>firm</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as a very similar word, <ja>固い</ja>. So, if you can use that word to help you to remember, you'll remember the reading of this word in no time as well!
